about_the_game:
The main character of this adventure is Saul – a boy with the ability to wield a sword and magic, which will help him defeat all kinds of enemies. But don't rush to check this out! First, you need to learn to control your mind. Don't let the cute animals fool you, the spiders surround you, the dragons burn you, or the sly old lady take advantage of your kind heart. Get ready to face a real challenge in the chaos of dungeons, tangled forests, and unexplored pathways!

Features

  • Find your own path in the best traditions of Metroidvania and discover secrets of this world.
  • Go on an adventure full of vivid characters, exciting stories, and fun dialogues.
  • Become a part of the world, not the center of it.
  • Get rid of evil or remain neutral: the decision is yours!
  • Use a sword and magic to defend yourself against creatures that do not understand human speech.
  • If you can, conquer the toughest beasts on and under the earth.
  • Upgrade your gears to reach new places.
  • If you find polycrystals, don't sell them! They may help you learn new abilities.
  • Combine artifacts: they will offer you new opportunities.
  • Take a break and relax: this place is filled with beautiful views!
  • Don't forget to look at the clock. The immersive music will make you lose track of time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 or AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 | AMD RX 570
